description:
With PlanMyDay you get your time schedule easily under control!

PlanMyDay is more than just a task manager, because it allows to plan & to prioritize tasks.

Each task gets associated a duration and other attributes associated. Then all tasks can be prioritized, simply by changing the order,

This allows at any time an overview, which tasks can be done in which time frame. 
You can activate the current task, i.e. the elapsed time is counted. At the same time, the time planning for the following. Tasks gets continuously updated.

So you have a continuous overview, of how much time is left for the day.

----

The free version is limited to eight entries
or eight hours of planning time.

NEW:
- Multiple checkins are now possible
